## Accessibility Improvements (WCAG 2.1 AA)

**Phase:** Phase 2 - User Experience & Polish
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 2.2

### Goal
Deliver exceptional user experience with mobile optimization and accessibility

### Impact
Makes app usable for all users

### Effort Estimate
2 weeks

### Priority
P1

### Tasks

- [ ] Complete keyboard navigation for all features
- [ ] Add comprehensive ARIA labels and roles
- [ ] Ensure color contrast meets WCAG standards
- [ ] Implement skip links and landmark regions
- [ ] Add screen reader announcements for dynamic content
- [ ] Create accessibility testing suite

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
